title: Evaluating Device-First Continuum AI (DFC-AI) for Autonomous Operations in the Energy Sector
summary: Industrial automation in the energy sector requires AI systems that can operate autonomously regardless of network availability, a requirement that cloud-centric architectures cannot meet. This paper evaluates the application of Device-First Continuum AI (DFC-AI) to critical energy sector operations.
